name: deviceManagement_CreateIntents
description: Create new navigation property to intents for deviceManagement

$block: Entity that represents an intent to apply settings to a device

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**categories**: Collection of setting categories within the intent
**deviceSettingStateSummaries**: Collection of settings and their states and counts of devices that belong to corresponding state for all settings within the intent
**deviceStateSummary**: A summary of device states and counts of devices that belong to corresponding state for all devices that the intent is applied to
**deviceStates**: Collection of states of all devices that the intent is applied to
**isAssigned**: Signifies whether or not the intent is assigned to users
**lastModifiedDateTime**: When the intent was last modified
**roleScopeTagIds**: List of Scope Tags for this Entity instance.
**settings**: Collection of all settings to be applied
**templateId**: The ID of the template this intent was created from (if any)
**userStateSummary**: A summary of user states and counts of users that belong to corresponding state for all users that the intent is applied to
**userStates**: Collection of states of all users that the intent is applied to
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
